price: Dan tak ada sesuatu ayat pun dari ayat-ayat458 Tuhan sampai kepada mereka, melainkan mereka selalu berpaling darinya (mendustakannya).
arabic: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
footnotes: 458.  "Ayat" di sini berarti mukjizat, atau ayat Al-Qur`ān, atau peristiwa-peristiwa yang terjadi dalam alam yang menunjukkan kekuasaan Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā tatīhim min āyatin min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū ʿanhā muʿ'riḍīna
